summary: After chomping through the fish population, thousands of starved lampreys begin attacking the citizens of a sleepy lake town, and the community scrambles to stay alive.
cast: Shannen Doherty|Jason Brooks|Zack Ward|Christopher Lloyd|Ciara Hanna|Koosha Yar|Fred Stoller|Rachel True|Jeremy Wade|Susie Abromeit|Jody Barton|Nicholas Adam Clark|Mark Christopher Lawrence|Mike Jerome Putnam|Gerald Webb|Gordon Bressack|Jacqui Holland|T.J. Jones|James Cullen Bressack
title: Lago de Sangre: El ataque de las lampreas asesinas
